errors.error_description: The instructions unnecessarily require the user to manually install the `shap` dependency, which is already handled by the `probatus` package installation.
correction_candidates: Remove the `pip install shap` command and the accompanying text.
Add a note that `shap` is a core dependency that will be installed automatically.
Combine the installations into `pip install shap probatus`.
Move `pip install shap` after `pip install probatus` to verify the installation.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the `pip install shap` command and the accompanying text.
